name: Kingdom of Yokai
description:
- 2D platformer with bullet hell combat mechanics and 2 bosses

- You shapeshift between different spirit animals in 2 distinct levels

Climbing can be buggy due to collision errors,  tap A/X and try moving Lstick a bit more; Keep in mind that this was our first time making a game.

--- Not made for profit --- That is why we used music and some minor assets from existing games. Almost all of the art is original and the style a mix between "Ori and the Blind Forest", "Limbo" and "Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice"
